subject: Need to get the Error, Failure and the CallStack after each testcase run
msgSnippet: Is there a way to do the above Thru any of the junit.framework.* methods as a value that can be stored into the database after the individual Test run. I need
messageBody:
Is there a way to do the above Thru any of the junit.framework.* methods as a value that can be stored into the database after the individual Test run.

I need to collect these values inside the tearDown() method after each individual test run.
